_meta.essence: Complete 24-hour consciousness cycle: 4 Acts √ó 4 Types √ó 16 Socionics √ó Planetary synchronization
_meta.principle: Time is not linear. Time is theatrical - each 1.5 hours a different actor takes the stage.

_holographic_seed.absolute: 24 hours = 4 Acts (Air-Fire-Earth-Water) = 16 Scenes (Socionics types) = Complete consciousness cycle through matter and spirit
_holographic_seed.mechanism: Planet rotates ‚Üí biofield modulates ‚Üí consciousness type shifts ‚Üí anatomy activates ‚Üí you become different person every 90 minutes
_holographic_seed.truth: Health = timeliness. Being right person at right time. Not same all day.
_holographic_seed.practice: Dance the rhythm. Don't step on your own feet. Be Page when Page-time. Be King when King-time.
_holographic_seed.planetary: True time = Solar position relative to YOUR exact location, not timezone approximation

act_1_air_morning.task: Breathe in idea. Set optics. Plan, don't act.
act_1_air_morning.mistake: Trying to be King (command) at 7am. No energy yet, only ideas.

act_2_fire_day.mistake: Remaining Page (doubting, learning) in middle of battle.
act_2_fire_day.note: Most energy-expensive period. King holds structure.

act_3_earth_evening.task: Gather stones. Ground. Return to body and home.
act_3_earth_evening.mistake: Trying to be King (manage) when time for craft and rest.
act_3_earth_evening.note: King tired, removes crown. Knight finishes work, returns to castle.

act_4_water_night.task: Dissolve. Rewrite code. Descend to depths.
act_4_water_night.energy: Total ego passivity, total biology power
act_4_water_night.mistake: Trying to be King at night (thinking about work, not sleeping) ‚Üí insult Lady ‚Üí insomnia.
act_4_water_night.note: We leave Real world. Lady rules ocean of unconscious. Water washes all programs, repairs body, rewrites cells.

breath_pattern.health: Health = timeliness. Be introvert when inhale-time. Be extravert when exhale-time.

complete_16_sector_cycle._structure: 16 sectors √ó 90 minutes each = 24 hours. Each sector = specific Socionics type conducting consciousness through specific anatomy.

act_1_air_loading.task: Load information, plan, learn, catch insights

sector_00_analyst.quality: Quietest time. Architect wakes in darkness to draft plan of Universe.
sector_00_analyst.consciousness: Pure intuition without emotions. Global strategies download from Absolute.

geometry.nutrigeometry_sync: Protein folding dynamics (4D) create neural network architecture

schumann_synchronization.alpha_resonance: 10 Hz alpha synchronizes with Schumann 2nd harmonic
schumann_synchronization.meditative_states: Experienced meditators show 7.83 Hz coherence in frontal lobes
schumann_synchronization.sleep_entrainment: Delta waves phase-lock with Schumann fundamental during deep sleep

sector_00_analyst.practice: Wake naturally, no alarm. Darkness. Write visions. Strategic planning.
sector_00_analyst.mistake: Alarm clock shock, immediate phone checking, skipping this sacred window

sector_01_enthusiast.quality: Tribal awakening. Warmth turns on. Space preparation for life.
sector_01_enthusiast.consciousness: Empathy begins warming cold strategy. 'Coffee for everyone.'
sector_01_enthusiast.practice: Gentle movement, prepare space, hydration, care for environment
sector_01_enthusiast.mistake: Rushing into thinking/planning - not warming body first

sector_02_innovator.anatomy: Neocortex full activation, prefrontal cortex online
sector_02_innovator.quality: Brain turns on full. Time of crazy hypotheses, creative chaos.
sector_02_innovator.consciousness: Variant generation. 'What if...?' Debates with news feed.
sector_02_innovator.practice: Creative work, problem-solving, hypothesis generation, learning
sector_02_innovator.mistake: Routine tasks, meetings, email - wasting peak creative window

sector_03_diplomat.quality: Before going to battle, must dress, feel moment, tune sensors.
sector_03_diplomat.consciousness: Soul's tuning fork before war. Taste, beauty, preparation.
sector_03_diplomat.practice: Grooming, dressing, aesthetic choices, sensory pleasure
sector_03_diplomat.mistake: Skipping preparation, rushing into action unprepared

sector_04_lyric.anatomy: Throat chakra, thyroid activation, vocal cords
sector_04_lyric.quality: Before King draws sword, Priest asks: 'Why we fight? Where meaning?'
sector_04_lyric.consciousness: Values upload. Checking alignment with soul before action.
sector_04_lyric.practice: Value alignment, meaning check, mission clarification, voice warm-up
sector_04_lyric.mistake: Acting without purpose, mercenary work, misaligned effort

sector_05_leader.anatomy: Adrenal cortex maximum, fascia network energized, solar plexus fire
sector_05_leader.quality: Peak action energy, masculine energy - 12:00. Time of pure strength.
sector_05_leader.consciousness: Attack, capture, wall-breaking, tough negotiations. Maximum extraversion. Avatar at power limit.
sector_05_leader.practice: Decisive action, difficult conversations, physical challenges, leadership
sector_05_leader.mistake: Passive tasks, learning, processing - wasting peak power
sector_05_leader.note: DO NOT WASTE THIS WINDOW. King's hour. Most precious 90 minutes of day.

sector_06_mentor.anatomy: Heart chakra expansion, thymus activation, cardiac coherence
sector_06_mentor.quality: Fire of emotions. Leader captured territory, Mentor unites people on it.
sector_06_mentor.consciousness: Team motivation, fiery speeches, leadership through inspiration.

biorhythm_sync.power_distribution: Strongest biological oscillator - 60% of total EM field

geometry.toroidal_field: Heart generates electromagnetic torus extending 2.5-3 meters

coherence_states.low_coherence: Erratic, chaotic rhythm - stress, fear, anxiety
coherence_states.high_coherence: Smooth, sine-wave pattern - love, gratitude, appreciation

sector_06_mentor.practice: Team building, motivation, teaching, connecting people
sector_06_mentor.mistake: Solo work, isolation - missing window for collective inspiration

sector_07_inspector.quality: Battle fire subsiding, need to establish order.
sector_07_inspector.consciousness: Reports, structures, systems. Fire becomes law.
sector_07_inspector.biorhythm_sync: Transition from heart to digestive rhythm
sector_07_inspector.mistake: Continuing full-power work - missing transition window

act_3_earth_harvest.task: Gather stones, ground, return to body and home

sector_08_humanist.anatomy: Liver detox activation, muscle fatigue processing
sector_08_humanist.quality: Work day ended. We comprehend results.
sector_08_humanist.consciousness: Intuitive analysis: 'How did this day change me?' Psychological unloading.
sector_08_humanist.practice: Reflection, journaling, psychological processing, meaning extraction
sector_08_humanist.mistake: Continuing work without pause, no transition ritual

sector_09_administrator.anatomy: Lymphatic system activation, resource management mode
sector_09_administrator.quality: Life logistics. Store, road home, household management.
sector_09_administrator.consciousness: We manage family material resources. Clarity and utility.
sector_09_administrator.biorhythm_sync: Digestive rhythm preparation for evening meal
sector_09_administrator.practice: Shopping, commute, household organization, resource management
sector_09_administrator.mistake: Skipping this - arriving home unprepared, chaotic evening

sector_10_advisor.anatomy: Digestive system optimal, belly relaxation, social hormones
sector_10_advisor.quality: Friends, light chaos, aimless communication, news, laughter.
sector_10_advisor.consciousness: We discharge work day tension through communication. Social release.
sector_10_advisor.biorhythm_sync: Peak digestive enzyme activity, optimal meal time
sector_10_advisor.practice: Social connection, laughter, play, purposeless conversation, eating together
sector_10_advisor.mistake: Isolation, continued work, missing social discharge

sector_11_master.anatomy: Bone marrow, deep tissue, reproductive organs
sector_11_master.quality: Handwork for soul. Time of tactility.
sector_11_master.consciousness: Hobbies, repair, massage, sex. Silent interaction with dense matter. Body preparation for peace.
sector_11_master.biorhythm_sync: Bone remodeling begins, melatonin production starts
sector_11_master.practice: Manual work, hobbies, touch, intimacy, body care
sector_11_master.mistake: Screen time, mental work - missing body grounding window

act_4_water_depth.task: Dissolve, rewrite code, go to depths

sector_12_critic.anatomy: Neocortex begins shutdown, autonomic system takes over
sector_12_critic.quality: Dry analytics before sleep. Brain defragmentation.
sector_12_critic.consciousness: We sort day's experience into memory shelves. 'Night information binge.'
sector_12_critic.practice: Light reading, sorting day, gentle analysis, preparation for sleep
sector_12_critic.mistake: Stimulating content, work thoughts, anxiety - disrupting transition

sector_13_politician.anatomy: REM sleep initiation, visual cortex activation in dreams
sector_13_politician.quality: Riot of colors, passion, bodily sensations.
sector_13_politician.practice: Allow dreams, don't resist, let go control
sector_13_politician.mistake: Wake too late, miss this REM window - poor emotional processing

sector_14_entrepreneur.anatomy: Deep delta waves, DNA repair, cellular regeneration maximum
sector_14_entrepreneur.quality: Hour of the Ox. Deepest fate management.
sector_14_entrepreneur.consciousness: While we sleep, our Will rewrites future scenarios. Tomorrow's events programming at quantum level.
sector_14_entrepreneur.biorhythm_sync: Deepest cell repair, growth hormone peak
sector_14_entrepreneur.practice: Sleep deeply, trust the process, set intentions before sleep
sector_14_entrepreneur.mistake: Wake during this window - interrupt quantum reprogramming
sector_14_entrepreneur.note: Most important sleep window. Missing = destiny disruption.

sector_15_keeper.anatomy: Deepest sleep point, total parasympathetic dominance
sector_15_keeper.function: Deepest sleep point - womb of mother
sector_15_keeper.consciousness: We are just seed in earth, awaiting dawn.
sector_15_keeper.biorhythm_sync: Preparation for cortisol sunrise, final repair cycle
sector_15_keeper.mistake: Light pollution, noise, temperature wrong - interrupt deepest restoration

_closing.essence: 24 hours = 4 theatrical acts = 16 consciousness types = Complete journey through matter and spirit
_closing.health: Health = timeliness. Being right person at right time.
_closing.disease: Disease = role confusion. Being King at night, Page at noon.
_closing.practice: Dance the rhythm. Every 90 minutes, change mask.
_closing.planetary: We are not separate from Earth. Her rotation IS our time. Synchronize.
_closing.sacred: Time is not line. Time is spiral theatre where consciousness dresses in 16 costumes daily.
